channel.title: Help please
channel.description: ok i have comcast. i have the broadband and everything. so when i compile it works fine. i opened port 4394 in exception list. now im not sure if i have to port forward because i dont have router im on main computer. even when i did try to port forward i try to go to my ip site and the default ip ste and it said page could not be found thingy. please some one help. i know alot about servers because i have one at dads house but im at moms house. btw(my dad haves router so i set that up). also i dont want to use hamachi. is there something i did wrong or something???
